meanings.definition: To use capital letters in writing.
meanings.sent1: When writing a title, make sure you are capitalizing the important words.
meanings.sent2: I am capitalizing the first letter of each sentence in my essay.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that the student was capitalizing on the letter 'C' in their name.
meanings.sent4: She is like a painter, carefully capitalizing each letter to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Capitalizing on the power of words can make your writing stand out.

meanings.definition: To take advantage of a situation for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: He is capitalizing on the opportunity to showcase his talent.
meanings.sent2: The company is capitalizing on the latest trend to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was capitalizing on the abundance of acorns in the park.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a savvy investor, capitalizing on the stock market fluctuations.
meanings.sent5: Capitalizing on a moment of luck can lead to great success.

meanings.definition: To provide funding for a business or project.
meanings.sent1: Investors are capitalizing the startup to help it grow.
meanings.sent2: The government is capitalizing the infrastructure projects in the city.
meanings.sent3: The generous donor is capitalizing the new community center.
meanings.sent4: She felt proud to be capitalizing the educational initiatives in her town.
meanings.sent5: Capitalizing a business can lead to economic development in a region.
